CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Aluminum
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Aluminum
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Aluminum is a lightweight, silvery-white metal known for its corrosion resistance and flexibility. Its low density and high strength-to-weight ratio make it ideal for structural and high-tech uses.
